translation: even if one’s lifespan were to last through all four ages
and even become ten times greater than that
even if one were known throughout the nine continents
and everyone were to walk in their company
even if one’s good name were carefully kept exalted
and the world were to take up and sing their praise and glory
if the Lord’s gracious glance were not to fall on that one
then who would care about their talk at all?
they would be counted as a mere worm among worms
and those themselves in blame would still lay blame upon them
O Nanak, the One turns the virtue-less into one possessed of virtue
and grants yet more virtue to those already full of virtue
there appears no such one at all
who could in any way bestow virtue upon That One. ||7||
